state: Hey, thanks for coming over to the TextWorld today, there is something I need you to do for me. First, it would be great if you could move north. Following that, try to venture north. That done, take a trip west. Following that, make an effort to head north. Then, take a trip west. And then, travel south. Okay, and then, move west. With that done, make an effort to move south. After that, go south. Then, make an attempt to move east. And then, go to the north. With that accomplished, make an attempt to take a trip east. And then, attempt to go to the south. And then, retrieve the gummy bear from the stand. And once you've done that, you win! -= Basement =- You are in a basement. A typical kind of place. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. There is an unblocked exit to the west. There is a shirt on the floor. > -= Basement =-0/1
next_state: -= Bathroom =- Well, here we are in a bathroom. I guess you better just go and list everything you see here. There is an unblocked exit to the north. There is an unblocked exit to the south. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked. > -= Bathroom =-0/2

However, the armchair, like an empty armchair, has nothing on it. What's the point of an empty armchair? There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked. > -= Cubicle =-0/3

next_state: -= Spare Room =- You find yourself in a spare room. A typical kind of place. You can see a crate. You can see an opened safe. The safe is empty! What a waste of a day! You hear a noise behind you and spin around, but you can't see anything other than a stand. Why don't you take a picture of it, it'll last longer! The stand is usual. On the stand you see a gummy bear. Suddenly, you bump your head on the ceiling, but it's not such a bad bump that it's going to prevent you from looking at objects and even things. There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. There is an unblocked exit to the west. > -= Spare Room =-0/4
